      public void moveBall​(int initialDistance, double initialVelocity, double acceleration)
      Represents how the soccer ball moves in the game
      Parameters:
      initialDistance - A int that contains the initial distance traveled by the soccer ball
      initialVelocity - A double that contains the velocity of the ball that it is traveling in
      acceleration - A double contains acceleration of the ball to move the ball to the goal net
